metadata.name: Rarie's Surf
metadata.description:
Welcome to the Future Surf Shack at Bandyland Beach where the vibes are the HIGHEST & the waves formed are the RAREST! 

The editions you’re collecting over the next week are more than an entry into this first raffle! They are the currency for two worlds colliding and the entryway into one of the most prolific collaborations in web3 history. Here are the details:

Uncapped Open Edition  
02/22- 03/05 11:59pm ET  
$10  
Enjoy random raffles, exclusive access, claims, & burn wisely! 

Be sure to pick up after yourself to help keep our shores clean & oh! Please don’t bring any sand to the beach! 

Thank you for stopping by the surf!
